agentDescription: Architecture decision tracking. Use this when task intent aligns with tags: strategic, architecture. Use this construction when an agent task matches architecture decisions workflows and the team needs a repeatable, typed analysis contract. It cannot replace full runtime verification and does not guarantee correctness outside the provided input and capability constraints.
